actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: To enforce the guarantees of the first, fourteenth, and fifteenth amendments to the Constitution of the United States by prohibiting certain devices used to deny the right to participate in certain elections.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Voter Freedom Act of 1999 - Entitles an individual to be placed as a candidate on, and to have such individual's political party, body, or group affiliation in connection with such candidacy placed on, a ballot or similar voting materials to be used in a Federal election under specified conditions.

titles.title: To enforce the guarantees of the first, fourteenth, and fifteenth amendments to the Constitution of the United States by prohibiting certain devices used to deny the right to participate in certain elections.
